title: Ticket #3534: Fix RSS feed
description:
The RSS feed (http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/index.rss ) is broken, consisting of an empty list. This probably happened when the new site was put into place. It should be fixed.

(Initially assigning to myself (adesmet), but feel free to steal if it's still new)
